channel.title: Notes on Byone
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Byone

item.title: docker
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: redis docker pull redis 创建redis容器，启动redis-server docker run -d --name myredis -p 6379:6379 -v /c:/Workspace/redis redis --appendonly yes dockers中开启磁盘共享 ​ * -it 启动交互界面 启动redis

item.title: git
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: 配置 用户名和邮件 $ git config --global user.name "zhanggx" $ git config --global user.email enfizgx@163.com 设置别名 sudo git config –system alias.st status sudo git config –system alias.ci commit sudo git config –system alias.co checkout sudo git config –system alias.br branch 开启颜色提示 git config –global color.ui true 教程

item.title: redis
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: set key value get key mset mget 一次设置读取多个值 exists 判断key是否存在 del 删除key type 检查value类型 expire 设置key的有效值 expire key 时长(s) ex : set key value ex 时长(s)

item.title: soft
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: windows Listary total commander AHK Everything 搜索 common vim|neovim Emacs org-mode Potlayer WW 视频播放器 Foobar2000 音乐播放器 Ditto 剪贴版加强 hexo 博客 mkdocs 文档 Firefox/Chrome 浏览器（奔跑的奶牛） 书签同步 XMarks 鼠标手势 CLEAN crxMouse Gestures vim模式操作 Vimium gi

item.title: sercet
item.author: xtddw7@gmail.com (byone)
item.description: jupyter jupyter 0198 1 2 3 4 5 6 @echo off cd "c:\jupyter" jupyter notebook echo 【按任意键退出】 pause>nul exit mysql 3306 root 12346 1 2 3 4 5 6 @echo off cd "C:\MySQL\Engine\bin" mysqld --console echo 【按任意键退出】 pause>nul exit mkdocs 1 mkdocs serve --dev-addr=0.0.0.0:5858 zhtj ID ggcjdss9/ server 10.30.0.14 enfiyjy-svr\svradmin ggcjdss9/
